rules_text:
Whenever you create one or more creature tokens, put a +1/+1 counter on Steppe Shepherd.
At the beginning of your end step, if Steppe Shepherd’s power is 4 or greater, add a 4/4 green Elephant creature token with trample to your bestiary. [i](If you would create a creature token, you may instead put one into play from your bestiary.)[/i]
